comment: Caramel start, smooth, and a note of cinnamon at the end. Pairs well with spicy, chocolate desserts.
Don't think I had the 20 yr but the regular is sweet smooth and delicious
Very nice although overpriced.   Smooth Carmel's with a little charcoal.  They did a good job.
Very smooth, but relatively flat.  Not a lot going on in this bottle to be 20 years old, but it is incredibly smooth.  For $80, its hard not to try.

smooth from nose to finish.  will definitely be on the look out for a bottle for the house.
Tate's in Dallas until then.
